channel.title: ElementJS - Fluid Simulation
channel.description: Recent content on ElementJS - Fluid Simulation

item.title: Fluid Simulation - 1
item.description: Initial Setup To do anything fun with HTML, you need the canvas tag. In this post, we will setup the following. 1. Files 2. Folders 3. Basic boiler-plate code for each file. 4. Basics of HTML canvas File & Folders Fire up whatever code-editor or IDE you use for web development, create a index.html file. This will be the index point for our canvas. The HTML file doesn’t have to be elaborate with a lot of styling.
